text: awasan mohothe ho sappu sawariye yamata perum purana piris boho wethi.

nikini mase 28 withara me gamana yanna kalin salasum kalath, katharagama dewale mangalya samaya aasanna nisa awashya pahasukam sapaya ganimedi karadara wewi kiyala danna kiyana mithuran kipa denek kiwwa nisa dinaya tikak passata gaththa.

ee uthsawedi ‘katawahara saha gath waharehi’ wenasa yana mayen mahacharya je.bi. disanayaka mahaththaya kala kathawa ahapu ashokata kawada hari wishwa widyaleta gihin ‘wag widyawa‘ igenaganna oonaya kiyala hithuna. 1972 di usas pela samathwela kalaniya wishwawidyaleta athuluwunu ohuta hithu hatiyatama mahacharya je.bi. disanayaka, mahacharya karunathilaka saha mahacharya kakulawala yana guruwarun wethin wag widyawa pulul lesa igana gannata awasthawa uda wuna.1977 di ashoka wag widya wisheshawedi upadhiya prathama panthi gaurawa sammanayak sahithawa samath wuna. 1977 sita 1979 wana thuru sandalankawe shasthrodaya piriwene iganwu ashokata 1979 di kalaniya wishwa widyalaye wag widya anshaye sahakara kathikacharya thanathurak himi wuna. 1981 di podu rajya mandalayen fulbrayit shishyathwayak laba landan wishwa widyalayata athulath wu ashoka ehi peradiga ha aprikanu adhyayana kendrayata sambandha wi darshanapathi ha darshana wisharada upadhi laba gaththa.ashoka yugadiwiyata athulath wune 1982 di bale patan hondin dana handina siti ohuge nanandiya wu wallawa swarna athapaththu menewiya ha samanga.
asama sama santhuwaraya oska romero agaradaguru thuma okthobara 14 wanada romaye pawathwanu labana diwya pujawaka di katholika sabhaw santhuwarayata osawanu labayi.
priya me wage lipi nithara liyanawata sthuthi, amma kiyana charithaya ada samajaye ekthara charithayak pamanakma wena than ananthayi..

karume kiyanne ee madiwata ape gedara thiyena okkoma kabinat warga (kichan kabinat athuluwa ) hadawala thiyenne ee aththige ine usata...ee unata, ee aththige iwum pihum walata thiyena hakiyawa saha mage sarira saukhyana gana salakala, ape gedara 90% pamana iwum pihum kerenne nam me asarana ritak wage inna mage ath deken...

elle kridawa shri lankawa pura pamanak nowa jathyanathara kridanganayan kara ragena yamata tharam ithaudwegakara tharaga ratawak pennum karanu labana kridawak bawata amuthuwen hadunwadimata awashya nowana athara ema kridawe unnathiya wenuwen mahath wu meheyan kara athi ayawalun bohoya.ee atharata eya winasha karamin ee magin thama bada wiyatha soya gannata uthsuka wana ketasak menma in thama thamange janapriyathawaya godanaga gannata walikana pirisakda naththe nowe.eheth me depirisatama atharin elle kridawata thama pana men aadaraya wagema gara karana pirisakda sitina bawa kisiwitakath amathaka nokala yuthuya.

namuth me wedika natyaye ena ‘di kiri di kiri’ githayata punchi kale indalama godak aasha kala.

chuti mahaththaya oheta kiyanna mage gawa thibba chen ekak eke disayin eka kiyala kiwwe "wi karala" ane manda mata nam ehema "wi karalak" eke penne naha.habayi ape "sudu" nam kiyannema eka "wi karala" disayin eka kiyalayi.ee witharak neme chuti mahaththayo dan awuruddakata kittu wena pawul jiwithaye athdakim thulin igena gaththu deyak thamayi apita waradinna puluwan unath eeyalata waradinawa kiyanne wenna bari deyak kiyala hitan.ithin sthanochitha pragnyawa bhawitha karalaee wage awasthawala eyalata dinuma dena eka thamayi mama karanne.mokada yudde karaddi wunath poddak upayashili widiyata pasu bahinna wenawane.
